content:
We share the song Agrarian revolution published by the Cultural Combat Front.

In the video description, FCC classmates write: “We share our Song Revolução Agrária, which we have made in Portuguese as a tribute to our beloved companions of the Poor Peasants League of Brazil (LCP). We have accompanied the song with photographs that show the revolutionary work of the LCP, which we have taken from the wage to Nova democracy. @Jornalanovademocracy Long live the LCP! Long live the fight for the earth! Death to the landowner! "
title: New song from the Cultural Combat Front - FCC
author: Nueva Democracia
